Package frogger.world

Class World

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
frogger.world.World
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
Direct Known Subclasses:
InfoPage, Level, LevelSelect, MainMenu
public abstract class World
extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane
World is the base abstract class to be extended by all branch nodes in the JavaFX scene graph of the Frogger game. A World object only supports adding children nodes of type Actor to the scene graph.
See Also:
Actor

  • Field Details

    • timer

      private javafx.animation.AnimationTimer timer
      Stores reference to an AnimationTimer to be used.

  • Constructor Details

    • World

      public World()
      Instantiates a World object that contains an anonymous ChangeListener which will listen to changes in the Node.sceneProperty(). The instance contains the uses the following:
      • Scene.setOnKeyPressed(EventHandler)
      • Scene.setOnKeyReleased(EventHandler)
      If the event occurs, World will call its own EventHandlers if it exists. EventHandlers of all child nodes are also called.

  • Method Details

    • createTimer

      public void createTimer()
      Instantiates an AnimationTimer to store in the private timer field. This AnimationTimer acts as the timer for all child nodes of the instance and calls act(long) and Actor.act(long) every frame.

    • start

      public void start()
      Call the createTimer() method and AnimationTimer.start().

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops the AnimationTimer using AnimationTimer.stop().

    • add

      public void add​(Actor actor)
      Adds an Actor instance as a child node to the scene graph.
      Parameters:
      actor - The Actor instance to be displayed by the scene graph.

    • remove

      public void remove​(Actor actor)
      Removes an Actor instance from the scene graph.
      Parameters:
      actor - The Actor instance to be removed.

    • getObjects

      public <A extends Actor> java.util.List<A> getObjects​(java.lang.Class<A> cls)
      A method to get a list of all child nodes attached to the instance (root node), filtered by class.
      Type Parameters:
      A - A class that must be a subclass of Actor
      Parameters:
      cls - The class used to filter the list of all child nodes.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of all child nodes attached to the instance, filtered by class.

    • act

      public abstract void act​(long now)
      Abstract method to be implemented by subclasses. Called every frame in AnimationTimer.handle(long) by the timer instance stored in this instance of World.
      Parameters:
      now - Time in nanoseconds. Passed as argument from AnimationTimer.handle().
